name: script
prompt_spin:
spin the puppet
to test on camera

scripts.title: FPO
scripts.name: Old Lady
scripts.text:
Old Lady Muppet enters right with heavy canvas sack over her shoulder. The Old Lady Muppet addresses Gordon:

“Hey, Sonny.”

scripts.title: FPO
scripts.name: Young Macdonald
scripts.text: An outgoing farmgirl with a Scottish accent

scripts.title: FPO
scripts.name: AM Boy
scripts.text:
Cheerful, enthusiastic; a nice child; Mickey Rooney-ish

“You can call me Max”

scripts.title: FPO
scripts.name: French Businessman
scripts.text: “The sign says ‘Win a free lunch!’...I thought there was no such thing as a free lunch.”

scripts.title: FPO
scripts.name: AM Girl
scripts.text:
AM Girl in her living room. She is in front of a computer.

“Oh no! My computer isn’t working!”

scripts.title: FPO
scripts.name: Salesman
scripts.text:
An AM Man enters dressed as a salesman, carrying his briefcase. The AM Man is in his thirties, has brown hair, a pointy nose, a friendly face, and speaks with a kind of nasal, slightly annoying voice.

“Hello there. I’m your friendly neighborhood vacuum cleaner salesman.”
